release.action: New TerminalResource rule for JUnit. Old s3270 emulator removed. Use new s3270 version >= 3.5
New write command without setting input field
Support Debug Mode, use "setTerminalDebug(boolean isDebug)" in Terminal API to enable emulator debug mode.
Add MusicSP function test to JUnit test area.
FieldIdentifier is case sensitive by default now , implemented new CI_CONTAINS MatchMode for case insensitve contains
Update of the build process to separate unit and integration test. Implemented categoy marker interfaces for UnitTests and IntegrationTests
